step17.content: Here you can find everything else you may need including the option to delete, duplicate and change other options on your design.
step17.title: Advanced options

step15.content: You can download a FREE low-resolution PDF of your designs at anytime.
step15.title: Download your design

step4.content:
Co-Desygners can edit and add more to your project.
Tagged users will be notified every time your the project is updated.
step4.title: Team options

step9.content: Click here to see all designs under your account. You can filter designs by your role type, date and privacy.
step9.title: Filter options

step11.title: Privacy options
step11.content:
Private - Only you and your co-desygners will see it.
Team - Co-desygners and people you tag will see it.
Followers - All your Desygner followers will see it.
Public - Everyone will see it.

step6.title: Share options
step6.content: Share your designs online at anytime with Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and more.

step1.content:
Welcome to Desygner!
Let us quickly show you a few of the features we offer.
step1.title: Desygner Tour

step16.title: Buy your design
step16.content:
Buy your design at anytime from here. The formats available depend on the number of pages.
Magazine - 18 to 500 pages.
Hard Cover - 24 to 300 pages.
Handmade Designs - 20 to 70 pages.
Print-ready HQ PDF always available.
Worldwide delivery.
